title: Missing IP after logging in with new patch
body: So my IP was a 12998, but after logging in and going to the in game store to see how much new Kled stuff would cost, it all of sudden dropped to 6698 when my queue came up. I would really appreciate if someone could answer why this has happened. Thank you.

replies.body:
It's *extremely unlikely* for IP to go missing, and after taking a look at your account, it seems your IP balance in the client may have simply updated to reflect a recent purchase. Sometimes the server is slow to update, but if you try to purchase something, it forces an update in your client with your balances.

If you take a look at your purchase history, you should see this reflected in there. Please let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gUZnbrAX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-11T21:45:47.452+0000)
>
> It's *extremely unlikely* for IP to go missing, and after taking a look at your account, it seems your IP balance in the client may have simply updated to reflect a recent purchase. Sometimes the server is slow to update, but if you try to purchase something, it forces an update in your client with your balances.
> 
> If you take a look at your purchase history, you should see this reflected in there. Please let me know if you have any questions.

I did and it showed the last purchase as being on 8/6 now unless the servers take five days to claim a transaction of IP, which has nothing to do with money out of a bank or a gift card. I don't see why I lost anything the day in question. I could understand if it is in fact that slow, but I've never had issue with this in the 3 years I've been playing the game. So if it's just a false sense of what the client claims then like I said, I'll just make it back.

So the delay wouldn't be the act of IP actually coming out of your account, but simply the client visually updating the balance of IP after your last purchase. Lately, we've been seeing an increasing number of cases where the IP balance *visual display* in the client won't match the IP balance on the account until a purchase is attempted. We're investigating further to find out what's going on with that, but I wanted to let you know.

Let me know if you have any additional questions.

Nah that's good enough for me, thanks for informing me further and not letting this just fall to the wayside, much appreciated and you've been a big help.
